snippet: Court administrators have set up the first in what is expected to be a long series of special sessions to deal with the legal fallout from the actions of a state chemist charged with faking drug test results in criminal cases.
abstract: Massachusetts court administrators set up hearings for convicts serving sentences in which state chemist Annie Dookhan tested drug samples; Dookhan allegedly mishandled evidence, potentially causing thousands of wrongful convictions.
lead_paragraph: Court administrators have set up the first in what is expected to be a long series of special sessions to deal with the legal fallout from the actions of a state chemist charged with faking drug test results in criminal cases.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Hearings Are Set in Cases With Questionable Tests
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Hearings Are Set In Cases With Questionable Tests
